amendment.description: To restrict the use of funds for a permanent United States Africa Command headquarters outside of the United States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 562 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 562 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Hutchison. (consideration: CR S4702; text: CR S4702) To restrict the use of funds for a permanent United States Africa Command headquarters outside of the United States.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 562 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 562 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Hutchison.
